text:
If this does not 
help, a referral to the MO at the FRU is necessary.
/circle6 Check if the baby is warm, by feeling his/her feet every 15 minutes.
/lozenge6 If the baby’s feet feel cold, check the axillary temperature.
/lozenge6 If the baby’s temperature is below 36.5°C, provide warmth to the baby by placing 
him/her under a radiant warmer. 
/lozenge6 Teach the mother to provide skin-to-skin contact, a component of Kangaroo 
Mother Care (KMC). 
/lozenge6 Two components of KMC are skin-to-skin
